thread.section_title: The Goring - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good but not perfect
thread.title_full: Good but not perfect - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: sandhya k
title: Good but not perfect
text:
Currently staying here. Tomorrow is our last day.
On the first evening the waitress spilt champagne on my husbands trousers. The compensation for that
The omelette at breakfast was soggy and the wrong keys were given to my husband when we wanted to return to the room. A hat-trick of disasters for a top class hotel.
Otherwise a pleasant stay.
Waiter Zouhair, absolutely was faultless!
Would love to recommend it but
